divs: sighting detailsi waited until this morning (1\21\2010) to post the sighting because i wanted to verify i wasn't seeing lights from a helicopter or an antenna tower. on the morning of the 20th january 2010 between mile marker 20 and 19 (heading westbound) i noticed 3 lights in a triangle formation slightly off to the left of the eastbound lanes of route 50. they were approximately 100 feet above the treeline and stationary. i could see no visible marker or beacon lights. the lights were bright enough to see clearly through the cloud cover. i'm not sure how long it was there but i witnessed it for approximately 3 minutes approaching and from the driver's side mirror as i continued west toward davidsonville, md. weather 1\20\2010: cloudy w\slight rain\winter mix weather 1\21\2010: clear and 33 degrees i really think i need to start carrying a camera in my vehicle.
Summary: Lights in a triangle formation above Rt. 50 near Annapolis Maryland
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Annapolis
There were no other sightings in Annapolis on or around January 20th 2010
